name: Noctowl
flavorText:
Its eyes are
specially adapted.
They concentrate even faint light
and enable it to
see in the dark.

previous.name: Hoothoot
previous.flavorText:
It always stands
on one foot. It
changes feet so fast, the movement
can rarely be
seen.

next.name: Ledyba
next.flavorText:
It is very timid.
It will be afraid
to move if it is alone. But it will
be active if it is
in a group.
